synopsis.text:
Lot, a bustling city teeming with monsters, magic, and the mundane, Leonardo Watch finds himself on a quest for answers and justice. Three years prior, a gateway to the Beyond transformed New York City into Hellsalem's Lot, trapping otherworldly creatures and humans within its unyielding borders. As a young photographer gifted with the divine 'All-seeing Eyes of the Gods' at the expense of his sister's sight, Leonardo is driven to unravel the enigma of his powers and restore what was lost.

Joining the secretive supernatural organization Libra, Leonardo becomes an integral part of a team dedicated to preserving order amidst the chaos of Hellsalem's Lot. Confronting the relentless onslaught of extradimensional threats, these extraordinary individuals fight to safeguard their city and prevent the darkness from spreading. As Leonardo embarks on a series of mind-bending adventures with his fellow Libra members, he remains resolute in his pursuit of the truth behind his powers and a cure for his sister's blindness. In this urban battleground where madness and the everyday collide, Leonardo and his allies will stop at nothing to maintain the fragile balance between worlds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
